summary: An ordinance amending section 18 of Ordinance No. 16370 entitled: "An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system of the City of Seattle, regulating the use of electric current therefrom, providing for the sale of such electric current, fixing the price thereof and providing a method for collecting rates therefor, and providing penalties for violations of this ordinance", approved July 1, 1907, for the purpose of reducing certain rates for electric current and making changes in rules and regulations.
